backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing gallery and image management with CRUD operations for galleries and images, using blob storage mixin and Map data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from TeachersNotes component, replacing it with an initials-based fallback avatar.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including Hero, About, Courses, Teachers, TeachersNotes, Gallery, Contact sections with bilingual support and WhatsApp integration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables for Brilliant Coaching Centre branding (gold, maroon, dark backgrounds).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Brilliant Coaching Centre website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the application with QueryClient and LanguageProvider, rendering all main sections (Hero, About, Courses, Teachers, Gallery, Contact, etc.) plus floating utilities.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Us section displaying four key features (Concept Clarity, Personal Care, Discipline, Exam Preparation) in an animated grid with bilingual content support.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionForm.ts: Empty file placeholder for admission form component.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with address, phone, WhatsApp info and embedded Google Maps iframe showing Brilliant Coaching Centre location in Puabagan, Bankura with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Courses section displaying three tier cards (LKG-IV All Subjects, V-X English & Math, XI-XII English) with icons, badges, and bilingual descriptions.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Fixed bottom-right floating WhatsApp button that opens chat with pre-filled enquiry message to +91 98834 48350 with green branding.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with logo, tagline, contact info, social media links (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp), and a copyright notice with a watermark background logo.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Displays a photo gallery grid with classroom and event images; clicking an image opens a lightbox dialog with previous/next navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring the coaching centre logo, name, tagline (Education, Discipline, Success), and a WhatsApp CTA button for admission enquiries with animated background elements.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Fixed-position button in the top-right corner that toggles between English and Bengali languages using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx: Displays a grid of teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da, Santanu Sir) with avatars, classes taught, subjects, experience, and teaching focus areas.
frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.ts: Tabbed interface showing teacher profiles and their class notes organized by grade ranges (LKG-3, 4-10, 4-12) with download functionality placeholders.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Testimonials section with a blank state message encouraging students to be the first to share their experience; no reviews are currently displayed.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: React component displaying five key benefits of the coaching center (experienced teachers, small batches, regular tests, friendly environment, affordable fees) in a responsive grid layout with icons, bilingual support, and hover animations.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider for bilingual language switching (English/Bengali) with session storage persistence and a translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with authentication support, using React Query for caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark theme using gold/yellow and maroon color scheme, OKLCH color space, custom animations (fade-in, scroll, gradient), and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH color system (gold, maroon, dark backgrounds), container settings, custom animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, architecture notes, and generated images for a bilingual coaching center website with WhatsApp integration, photo gallery, testimonials, and downloadable class notes.
